title: Lincoln's WARNING #100069: Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up
script: Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up? Bread and circuses for the modern age. Keep you scared, keep you spending. That's the formula. See through it. Bitcoin below. Listen up. Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up... another distraction from the real theft. While you panic, they're laughing to the bank. Wake up. Bitcoin below.
